name: Peanut Factory
description:
Are you ready to become the greatest peanut tycoon of all time? Well then, you're just a tap away from it!

Peanut Factory is the idle game that will fill your world with delicious and crunchy peanuts!

  • Build a farm, a restaurant, a theme park and more!
  • Upgrade your buildings for great idle profits!
  • Be reborn to restart your game with an even greater tap and idle profit!
